name: Best BBQ Shrimp Ever
author: Huge
summary: This simple marinade for shrimp is guaranteed to please.  Passed down by my mother-in-law, it's without a doubt one of her greatest contributions to humankind. Serve over rice.
ingredients: ¾ teaspoon hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®)
2 pounds peeled and deveined medium shrimp
directions: Whisk together the canola oil, hot pepper sauce, garlic, chili sauce, lemon juice, and oregano in a large glass or ceramic bowl
Add the shrimp and toss to evenly coat
Cover the bowl with plastic wrap, and marinate in the refrigerator 1 hour
Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat, and lightly oil the grate
Remove the shrimp from the marinade, and shake off excess
Thread about 4 shrimp onto each skewer
Cook on the preheated grill until pink on the outside and no longer translucent in the center, about 3 minutes per side
